title: Ukraine Cease-Fire Largely Holds, Despite Shelling Reports
teaser: The cease-fire took effect Sunday morning, but there have already been accusations of shelling in the city of Debaltseve. NPR's Arun Rath talks to Karoun Demirjian from The Washington Post on the latest from the conflict zone.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
